component.name: RunManager
component.selected: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor

option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -runTests -batchmode -projectPath "C:\Development\Projects\F1 Fantasy Draft App\F1 Fantasy Draft App" -testResults Logs/results.xml -testPlatform EditMode -debugCodeOptimization

option.name: WORKING_DIRECTORY
option.value: C:\Development\Projects\F1 Fantasy Draft App\F1 Fantasy Draft App

task.summary: Made the draftee panel into a prefab with the intention of instantiating the prefab on setup. Added background colors to the SO's instead of using switch statement to change the background color, thus removing alot of reused code.

Refactored code to put all the selection display code into one class. Incorporated UIManager and SelectionManager to handle this process. Added UI elements to show hide driver - constructor selection. Added a random selection at start for the selection displays to get rid of the default editor values.
Added prompts to enable draftees to insert the amount of draftees and the draftee names. Also instead of prefabs, which were not showing on instantiate, I have them inactive in the heirarchy.

Added the UI draftee panel element to pop up after inserting the draftee name, also created a selection manager to handle the generation of draftees and keep an eye on who's turn it is to draft. Added references to the draftees so I can use them as singletons to reference the values inside.

Added draft button that will act as the user input for each selection, also working on getting the functionality of allowing the text to change base on value of the next selector. -- THIS IS STILL WIP -- Hid some things on the drafteePanel.cs so it defaults to empty when first enabled.

SetActive(false) on draft button once pressed, and re enabled draft button once the selection is completed. Set DrafteePanel to show the selected drivers with accumulating totals as the draft progresses. Added random spin amount to the selection process, to give it more variety. Changed the GetWhoIsSelectingNext to after the process has completed as was giving error, where it would total the wrong drafteepanel. Added isFirstPick bool to UIManager.cs to reuse the same method without it giving errors.
Added constructor to have the same functionality as the drivers. They now show up on drafteePanel and accumulate to the overall value of the team.

Added selected constructor and driver to draftee personal lists - Added a cautious 'yield return new WaitForSeconds(1f)' before removing the selected from the correct list, to ensure any process if any is finished as was running into an 'ObjectDisposedException' but apparently is only UnityEditor which wont be around in the build.
Refactored some code, removed unused method declarations and added red color to the drafteeSelectionValue if above 100m.
Added F1 Theme tune to play on repeat.

MESSAGE.value: Made the draftee panel into a prefab with the intention of instantiating the prefab on setup. Added background colors to the SO's instead of using switch statement to change the background color, thus removing alot of reused code.

Refactored code to put all the selection display code into one class. Added UI elements to show hide driver - constructor selection. Added a random selection at start for the selection displays to get rid of the default editor values.

Refactored code to put all the selection display code into one class. Incorporated UIManager and SelectionManager to handle this process. Added UI elements to show hide driver - constructor selection. Added a random selection at start for the selection displays to get rid of the default editor values.
Added prompts to enable draftees to insert the amount of draftees and the draftee names. Also instead of prefabs, which were not showing on instantiate, I have them inactive in the heirarchy.
Added the UI draftee panel element to pop up after inserting the draftee name, also created a selection manager to handle the generation of draftees and keep an eye on who's turn it is to draft.

Added the UI draftee panel element to pop up after inserting the draftee name, also created a selection manager to handle the generation of draftees and keep an eye on who's turn it is to draft. Added references to the draftees so I can use them as singletons to reference the values inside.

Added draft button that will act as the user input for each selection, also working on getting the functionality of allowing the text to change base on value of the next selector. -- THIS IS STILL WIP -- Hid some things on the drafteePanel.cs so it defaults to empty when first enabled.

SetActive(false) on draft button once pressed, and re enabled draft button once the selection is completed. Set DrafteePanel to show the selected drivers with accumulating totals as the draft progresses. Added random spin amount to the selection process, to give it more variety. Changed the GetWhoIsSelectingNext to after the process has completed as was giving error, where it would total the wrong drafteepanel. Added isFirstPick bool to UIManager.cs to reuse the same method without it giving errors.
Added constructor to have the same functionality as the drivers. They now show up on drafteePanel and accumulate to the overall value of the team.

Added selected constructor and driver to draftee personal lists - Added a cautious 'yield return new WaitForSeconds(1f)' before removing the selected from the correct list, to ensure any process if any is finished as was running into an 'ObjectDisposedException' but apparently is only UnityEditor which wont be around in the build.
Refactored some code, removed unused method declarations and added red color to the drafteeSelectionValue if above 100m.
Added F1 Theme tune to play on repeat.
